name: Ubuntuforums that is easier on the eyes
description:
Raplacing the bright whites with the soft Ubuntu browns, making the overall easier to look at.

Updates:
Made the new search bar blend into the style.
It also fixes some of the forum display bugs.
Now it also includes correctly transparent png images of the icons to blend with the new style.
